extendedInfo.description: Letâs Kick Some Balls! Do you suffer from an uncontrollable desire to kick balls? Thankfully, there is a cure. Through intuitive touch control and simple single button gameplay, Freekick Battle is the fix you need. With its sophisticated physics engine, Freekick Battle enables you to kick, spin and shoot balls with realistic accuracy! Hone your skills with multiple entertaining single player modes, then compete real-time via Match Play with other players across the world. Create a character through our vast array of customizable options and go kick some balls! ------------------------------ Features ------------------------------ KICK IT IN EXTREME REAL-TIME MATCHES Go against other players in real-time Match Play. See who can shoot the most goals in the allotted time. Level up and win big! SHOOT IT IN SKILL BASED ARCADE MODE Sharpen your shooting skills in Arcade Mode where you go head to head with CPU to earn experience points and make money. CUSTOMIZE IT WITH ENDLESS UPGRADES Create your own funny character through a wide set of costumes and original facial features designed to make each and every player unique. FLAUNT IT IN COMPETITIVE ONLINE RANKING Compare your scores and stats with other players across the world while challenging them in real-time matches. SMASH IT IN VIBRANT 3D Play in bright 3D graphics as the crowd cheers you on! __________________________________ NEWS & EVENTS Website http://www.gamevil.com Facebook http://facebook.com/gamevil Twitter http://twitter.com/gamevil YouTube http://youtube.com/gamevil

reviews.title: fun but
reviews.comment: its fun tho but 4 sum reason its hard to find people on this game like i only found 2 people but they left so i try again & nutin like i did it a couple of time like i wanna play wit people & not only play acrade
reviews.author: Jay Hollywood

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: Everything amazing. I would rate 5 star if you make the costumes and others to be cheeper. Except you gave me some more helpfull bonuses like in punch hero.
reviews.author: kevin reyson

reviews.title: 3 on 5
reviews.comment: on the whole the game is good but when the ball hits the goalpost and you hit it on the side of it. Instead of getting in it always go out and gold coins can\'t be spent as of very high costs of items.
reviews.author: Paul Debono

reviews.title: Best free kick game
reviews.comment: One of the best I\'ve ever played in a while and its dame addictive.  Just download it and you\'ll see that.
reviews.author: Ala Ferdo

reviews.title: Online play is horrible!
reviews.comment: The game is not very good. You get in game gold but have almost nothing to spend it on. Arcade gets boring very fast and online play is SUPER laggy no matter what type of connection you have. 2 stars for potential.
reviews.author: Tyler Wagner

reviews.title: A Fantastic Game!
reviews.comment: This game really make you feel like a pro in freekick...
reviews.author: Roy Zeng

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Game is loads of fun....the physics could back better lol. What I mean by that is make the ball bounce in when you hit the inside of the post or crossbar
reviews.author: Eulixis Marin

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing. Sometimes it is very hard to find an opponent. Like most of the free games, you have to pay for... everything.
reviews.author: Cristian Dina

reviews.title: This is awesome
reviews.comment: This game has got it very addictive but dont know about the online aspect
reviews.author: EDWARD YAMOAH

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Really fun to waste time when bored
reviews.author: Wyatt Colvin

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: The best free kick game....wow
reviews.author: Arun Kumaran

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: So far I don\'t have problem with this app
reviews.author: rio picmix

reviews.title: No offline play
reviews.comment: The game itaelf is good and fun to play but ONLY PLAYABLE WITH ACTIVE INTERNET CONNECTION. On my iPod it worked perfectly offline, with Android it doesn\'t even lauch the game.
reviews.author: Thomas Baudy

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I hope next time, goalkeeper are playable
reviews.author: joko risqi

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The game was pretty awesome,i mean i can play it for like 4 hours every day. But the multiplayer and stuff price is a little bit annoying. Overall this is a great game.waiting for more updates
reviews.author: Marvin Wongkar

reviews.title: bug
reviews.comment: galaxy s4 start loading screen crashing every time
reviews.author: Nathan Huang

reviews.title: fun little distraction
reviews.comment: An enjoyable effort, good for killing a little time on a long journey. This being Gamevil there are no shortage of in app purchases, but they tend towards the cosmetic and are easily enough avoided. Not bad at all.
reviews.author: Joe Griffin

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Fun game. I love gamevil games
reviews.author: Geoff Allen

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Very fun and addictive. Items are too expensive and those better ones require stars to purchase.  I dont see anyway to earn them in game except paying through real money.
reviews.author: Randy Leong

reviews.title: Multiplayer blocked on nexus 7
reviews.comment: What a shame. I used to be a big fan of gamevil, even donated for one game. Uninstall
reviews.author: Jonah Z.
